item.title: Ex-Prince Andrew moves out of royal home amid new Epstein revelations

item.title: Ukrainians remain defiant as Russia targets infrastructure during winter
item.description: Ukrainians are reeling from a frigid winter but remain defiant as Russia continues to target infrastructure. CBS News' Aidan Stretch has more.

item.title: Fall in love with these Valentine's Day book recommendations
item.description: Amazon Books' editorial director Sarah Gelman joins "CBS Mornings" with some favorite book recommendations for Valentine's Day.

item.title: No suspect identified in disappearance of Savannah Guthrie's mom
item.description: The disappearance of "Today" show co-host Savannah Guthrie's mother, Nancy Guthrie, is being investigated as a crime.
